outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>Mario's forward roll is intangible frames 4-16. Mario can act on frame 30. You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.</speak>
<speak>Mario's forward roll is intangible frames 4-16. Mario can act on frame 30. You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.</speak>
